landing.bio: Experienced Web and Mobile Apps Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in SAP Fiori, Angular, ReactJS, JavaScript, Java, Python, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, HANA, Full-Stack Development, Scrum. Strong information technology professional with a Engineer's degree focused in Systems Engineering.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building web and hybrid applications to provide solutions to customer needs under technologies such as SAP Cloud Platform, Javascript FullStack or microservices, among others.
Developer whit Java in the Backend and XML in the Frontend, in addition, a PostgreSQL database.
Worked on FugiTV building the backend system for the web application.

education.degree: Master of Science - MSc, Systems engineering and computing

interests.paragraphOne: In addition to being a systems engineer, I enjoy riding the roads on my motorcycle. I am passionate about contact sports such as American football or Olympic wrestling, however, I also like to read about philosophy and poetry.
interests.paragraphTwo: From my professional side, I aspire to continue training in computer science and I hope someday to have the opportunity to obtain a doctorate from MIT.

awards.awardDetail: SAP Certified Development Associate - SAP Fiori Application Developer (SAP) - Agost 2019 - ID. ILP7009878333
